conditions_play.warning_text: Your story contains missing conditions on links where it should be. Playback can be unpredictable.
conditions_play.error_text: Found links that require conditions for correct playback:
conditions_play.error_help_text: Add conditions to links that lead from nodes with multiple outgoing links. Links to choice nodes do not require conditions.

connectivity_error.heading: Graph connectivity error
connectivity_error.help_text:
Make sure all nodes and layers are connected into a single graph with one starting node. Check that there are no isolated parts of the graph. 

Click on a node in the list to find it on canvas
connectivity_error.multiple_start_nodes: Found {{count}} starting nodes. There should be only one starting node for correct playback.
connectivity_error.multiple_start_nodes_pluralized: Found {{count}} {{nodes}}. There should be only one starting node for correct playback.
connectivity_error.unreachable_nodes: Found {{count}} disconnected nodes. All nodes should be connected to the main graph.
connectivity_error.no_start_node: No starting node found. All nodes have incoming connections (possible cycle).
connectivity_error.click_to_copy: Click to find node on canvas and copy ID: {{id}}
connectivity_error.click_to_find: Click to find node on canvas

tool.layer_description: Create layers to organize sections of your flow.
tool.unlink_description: Create jumpers to connect distant parts without visible lines.
tool.note_description: Add notes to annotate your flow (only visible in edit mode).
tool.select_description: Select and move elements. Drag with right button or Space+Drag to pan canvas.
tool.narrative_description: Create narrative nodes to describe story events.
tool.choice_description: Create choice nodes that let users select different paths.
tool.jumper_description: Create jumpers to connect distant parts without visible lines.

- Highlight heroic character
- Add magical effects
- Make more detailed
- Avoid dark tones
